description: After a long and treacherous journey, our Hero finally arrives at the Dark Lady's castle only to find himself being asked for help. The Hero explains how the war that the demons have brought upon the humans have killed thousands and put more in misery. The queen of demons however argues that this war has made the human society band together as one and showed empirical evidence how it has increased population, increased production, boosted economy and improved society overall. Furthermore, she explains to the Hero that ending this war will result in a civil war that will produce more bloodshed than there ever was. The Hero, convinced that the only way to bring peace, relatively speaking, is to join forces with the Dark Lady, agrees to help with her plans!

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.description: Centers around the field of economics.

tags.name: Kingdom Management
tags.description: Characters in these series take on the responsibility of running a town or kingdom, whether they take control of an existing one, or build their own from the ground up.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Anachronism
tags.description: Prominently features elements that are out of place in the historical period the work takes place in, particularly modern elements in a historical setting.

tags.name: Teacher
tags.description: Protagonist is an educator, usually in a school setting.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.description: Features a character with larger-than-average breasts.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Educational
tags.description: Primary aim is to educate the audience.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

node.description: Originally an animator. Often works with [Hijiri Sanpei](https://anilist.co/staff/149565/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Kudo_M_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kudo_m_/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVcxdd04vCuhr-1t7mDh3gg)

Originating from [Artland](https://anilist.co/studio/8/). Most known for his work on the [Bleach](https://anilist.co/anime/269/) franchise.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/荒川稔久)

Married to fellow scriptwriter [Hiroko Naka](https://anilist.co/staff/181820/).
Originally an animator. Often works with [Hijiri Sanpei](https://anilist.co/staff/149565/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_silmeria_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/_silmeria_/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/54631733)
Hideki Furukawa is an animator and animation director.

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 1 - — You will be mine, Hero. — I refuse!
Episode 4 - If That Happens, I'll Take a Bite Out of the Hero!
Episode 5 - You smell good, Demon King. And I feel safe in your arms, Hero.
Episode 6 - —Welcome back, Hero! —Yeah, Old Man. I'm back!
Episode 7 - —I'll be back soon, we'll see each other soon.
Episode 8 - Take this sword, my lord
Episode 10 - So now their plans are finally coming to fruition?
Episode 11 - I just destroy and kill, without creating anything
Episode 12 - —I'm back, my Hero. —You sleep too much, my Demon King.
